CustomField.description:
Used to enqueue and track processing for records that require the creation of a Customer Product record to grant product access in the customer portal.
Pending: Set in before triggers for records that match criteria. Should never find records in this status as theyâ€™re almost immediately transitioned to Queued. Queued: Set for records for which a Platform Event to process the records has been created Completed: Set once a record has successfully been processed Failed: Set if a record fails processing in any way
CustomField.label: Customer Product Status
